response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly enhance your business operations. Given its high value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored to recognize your discerning taste and strategic vision. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can finalize the details promptly.", "product_price": 9500}
